message: Hello Bob! I'm excited to offer you this amazing product. I think you'll really love it. I'm willing to sell it to you for $130.
Thanks for the offer, Alice!  $130 is a good starting point, but I'm looking to spend closer to $125.  Let me know what you think.
I understand where you're coming from, Bob. I'm willing to meet you halfway. I can offer you the product for $127.50. What do you think?
